heading: rants & raves
subheading: date: wed, 29 dec 1999 09:13:04 -0800 from: “marc null” (mark-m@eudoramail.com) to: newsfeedback@wired.com subject: dvd hackers hit with lawsuit thank you for publishing the article on the dvd hacker lawsuit (“dvd hackers hit with lawsuit,” 28.dec.99). i found it to be a fair and thorough overview of the subject at hand. i have been reading […]
author: wired blogs
text: date: wed, 29 dec 1999 09:13:04 -0800 from: "marc null" (mark-m@eudoramail.com)to: newsfeedback@wired.comsubject: dvd hackers hit with lawsuitthank you for publishing the article on the dvd hacker lawsuit ("dvd hackers hit with lawsuit," 28.dec.99). i found it to be a fair and thorough overview of the subject at hand. i have been reading the stories published by other news sites and have found them to generally be biased, uninformed, and at times just wrong with respect to the facts.it makes me happy to see that there are still some publications that can be trusted to have integrity and a desire to get the facts right instead of trying to sensationalize the topic.
